title: (x) A Tribe Called Quest "Midnight Marauders" - hand lettered {Magnus}
content:
I'm in a bind. I need to match this font used in the cover for A Tribe Called Quest's "Midnight Marauders". If it is a custom job, is there anything thats similar that I can use a solution?   
   
Thanks. ![tribe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041921im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40117.jpg)
author: samiam

comments.content:
Looks like somebody's handwriting. Guess you will not be able to find it as a font.   
Try taking a look at [Dafont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041921/http:/dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=603&page=1&nb_ppp=40&texte=a%2Btribe%2Bcalled%2BQuest) Maybe you can find something suitable.   
   
magnus
Take a look in [Fonthead](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041921/http:/www.fonthead.com/), there you'll find some in the style.

You might also have a look at the fonts I have shown in [Part 14 (Strange, Distressed scripts) of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041921/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script14Pg1.html). Many of those styles would be similar to this sample, which as magnus pointed out is hand lettered.
